answers.text:
Hello:
I found this document on the Knowledge Network that may help you: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/5851/Solid_Waste_Funding_Presentation_The_Garbage_Fee
This document presents the city of Bettendorf, Iowa's, solid waste program in the context of budget decisions. It has some great resources that might better lead you to exactly what you are looking for.
Peggy
Knowledge Network Intern
pchaslern@icam.org

author: Joseph Jones
text: I work for the solid waste department in the city of Tyler texas. Currently we pick up twice a week. Currently we pick up north routes on monday and thursday, and south routes on tuesday and friday. Should a holiday fall on a monday we roll that pickup to tuesday and then roll tuesdays pickups to wednesday. We are considering changing that so there pickup would be canceled until there next scheduled day. I am looking for any data that would support our cause when we go to city council with this proposal. I appreciate any responses I may recieve. Thanks
title: Crew Leader
